titleStmt.title: Some papers given in by the Commissioners of the Parliament of Scotland to the honourable Houses of the Parliament of England. In answer to their votes of the 24. of September, 1646. Concerning the disposing of His Majesties person.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.
Loudoun, John Campbell, Earl of, 1598-1663. Severall speeches spoken ... in the Painted Chamber.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer t[o] the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Special t.p.: Severall speeches spoken by the Right Honourable the Earle of Loudoun, Lord High Chancellour of the Kingdome of Scotland at a conference with a committee of the Honourable Houses in the Painted Chamber, October 1646.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.
